data.text: The hotel is really great. It’s huge in the connection with the titanic palace. A lot of pools, aqua park for children and adults with many slides. The room was very good, clean, housekeeping did very good job. The food also tasty and various. The entertainment was on the highest level. For adults, for kids, for sporty and for lazy people as well. We recommend!
data.title: Hotel of the high class

data.text: What a lovely resort, friendly staff, great animation team, lots of activities and opportunities. We have walked away saying best resort and holiday we’ve ever been on. Lost count of swimming pools, all different temperatures and depths. Highly recommend!
data.title: Highly recommended

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Sunny Greetings from Titanic beach spa &aqua park hotel , thank you  for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad you enjoyed your room views and our friendly staff. We hope to have you back at your second home in the near future. 
Thank you for choosing Titanic beach spa &aqua park  hotel.
owner_response.author: Ahmed Mohamed

data.text: First time intitanoc alles really perfekt Gold Staff and Friendy ' nice Place ' Animation Team very nice to talk eny time ' good food , my children enjoy Aqua Park Mini Disco also nice for they like IT  ,   Show time atsmosfer   well come very soon again
data.title: Super holiday

Sunny greetings from Hurghada!
Thank you for your great review about your stay at titanic beach spa & aquapark hotel. This is exactly the kind of experience we strive to create for each and every guest & we are pleased to hear that we were able to give you the memorable vacation you deserve. 
Hotel Management team!
owner_response.author: Ahmed Mohamed

data.text: We have had an amazing stay here, Wonderful hotel, cozy large room, good staff. it’s very fun to play activities, delicious beer, great food, there are good restaurants, the food certainly didn’t disappoint, thank you for a pleasant stay, the water park is wonderful, I really enjoyed my stay, everything is clean and comfortable and we are yet to complain :)
data.title: A lovely vacation in Egypt

data.text: All good rooms very clean staff are lovely friendly helpful all fantastic food is good. Happy with pools towels and cleanliness of hotel. Staff are very hands on and attentive to our needs everything we have requested they have given soo good .
data.title: Family friendly

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest

Thank you very much for your positive opinion. We were pleased to hear that  you  enjoyed your stay at the Titanic Beach Hotel. 
So, we are all looking forward to seeing you soon again for another lovely holiday time with us.
Best regards,

Hotel management
